ThingDef.label: Makeshift Sight
ThingDef.description: A makeshift sight crafted using spare parts, old pipes and screws. It won't allow for much improvement except for better visibility when aiming.

ThingDef.label: Taped magazine
ThingDef.description: Two magazines taped together which should in theory improve reload times between shots. In theory.

ThingDef.label: Makeshift Nozzle
ThingDef.description: A nozzle crafted using spare parts and fittings. Improvement is not very noticible.

ThingDef.label: Makeshift Bayonet
ThingDef.description: A knife screwed in on the barrel to allow for easier melee attacks. Quite effective when it does not fall off.

ThingDef.label: Shotgun Shell Holder
ThingDef.description: Plastic holder which allows for storing spare shotgun shells on the side of the weapon.

ThingDef.label: Stock with Ammo Pouch
ThingDef.description: Stock that comes with built-in leather ammo pouch for easier access to shells in case of a gunfight.
